thread.section_title: MirrorMate Frames Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MirrorMate Frames | mirrormate.com
thread.title: Chantale

author: Chantale
title: Chantale
text: Love MirrorMate Frames....easy & economical solution to decorate a plain mirror. I was very surprise to see how easy it was to put together. The customer service was wonderful& very helpful. I am please to recommend MirrorMate and already share picture of my amazing mirror on social media. My only regret....wish I new about them when I redone my other bathrooms.
